Title: Daikin Releases Its Integrated Report 2025 and Sustainability Report 2025
Summary: The purpose of releasing its annual integrated report is to communicate Daikinâ€™s strengths, management strategy, and initiatives to enhance corporate value over the medium to long term. Focusing primarily on the pages featuring the messages from top management and management strategy, the 2025 edition explains, from both financial and non-financial perspectives, how the company intends to systematically implement the key strategy themes outlined in its Fusion 25 strategic management plan, further strengthen its management foundation, and implement specific measures for its future growth within the challenging business environment.
